successes.title: The Aviator Travel Jib
successes.description: Get big budget camera moves from a jib (crane) that weighs less than a bottle of soda, fits in a backpack, and sets up in seconds.

Pledges.description: Clip It! - Pack of 4 Nice Clip Lens Cap Clips (from our first Kickstarter project) - at a huge discount! That’s practically 50% off. (Includes US shipping - add $10 for international.)

Student Level - This is the same super light, super strong, super compact and fast set-up jib but without the bells and whistles. It is for the jib ONLY. It does NOT include: the bag, fluid pan base, mounting hardware, bubble levels, or ballast bag. Students only please. (Includes US shipping - add $35 for international.)

The Aviator Travel Jib - Back this project now to get the full travel jib kit at a huge savings. The kit INCLUDES The Aviator Travel Jib with fluid pan base, the high end padded bag, mounting hardware, bubble levels, and ballast bag. We are expecting to retail this kit for $525 including shipping. (Add $45 for international shipping.)

Can’t wait? Be one of the first 100 people in the world to get your very own Aviator Travel Jib. This is the full Aviator kit like the one above. But you’ll get it first. (Includes US shipping - add $45 for international.)

Carbon Fiber Edition - Just like The Aviator Travel Jib kit, but even lighter! The rods are made from 8 core Stealth Carbon Fiber. Includes a special edition padded bag along with the fluid pan base, mounting hardware, bubble levels, and ballast bag. (Includes US shipping - add $45 for international.)

Carbon Paradise - Back us today at this level and get everything in the Carbon Fiber Edition level and we’ll also include a genuine 3 Legged Thing carbon fiber “Eric” tripod with padded case. (Includes US shipping - add $65 for international.)
